item.title: Windows Useful Software Tips and Tricks
item.description: Here are things I use to get things done faster in windows. They offer quality of life and makes things less of a hassle. All for free. I will add more over time. Ninite Ninite is a great tool. You go to the website https://ninite.com/ pick the apps you want on your computer, and then you go down and press “Get Your Ninite”. It will download a Ninite installer which will automatically download and install the apps you picked to be installed.
